column1: @entity0 walked home from school on his birthday. He was surprised to see a lot of cars in front of his house. When he opened the door and entered the house, he heard a lot of people yell, "Surprise!" It was a surprise party for his birthday.His parents called all his friends' parents and invited them to come to a party for @entity0. @entity0 did not know anything about it. It was really a surprise to him. His best friends Jim and @entity4 were there. @entity3 and @entity2 were there, too. There were about @entity1 kids at the party, and some of their parents were there, too.After a few hours, @entity0 started to open his presents. He got a new shirt, a basketball, and a book about dinosaurs. Finally, he opened the last present, which was from his parents. It was a blue bicycle. @entity0 was happy, because that was what he wanted the most.After the presents were opened, all the kids started to get tired. They left one by one with their parents. @entity0 was tired also, because it was a big day for him. Finally, he went to bed and dreamed about all the cool presents he got.
